attributes.action: Close ALL shops on BOXING DAY!
attributes.additional_details: Close all stores to allow families to spend 2 days with each other over Christmas, it is after all a time for giving
attributes.background: Giving the year 2020 has been an awful time. Myself being a key worker working in retail, having worked all through the pandemic, i and my colleagues would like to spend Christmas with our  families without the worry of work and childcare the next day!
